Package metier.graphe.model.dao

Class DispoDAO

java.lang.Object
metier.graphe.model.dao.DAO<metier.persistence.Disponibilite>
metier.graphe.model.dao.DispoDAO
public class DispoDAO extends DAO<metier.persistence.Disponibilite>
DAO class for handling operations related to the Disponibilite entity. This class provides methods to create, delete, and query availability records for rescuers in the database.

    • isDisponible

      public boolean isDisponible(int idSecouriste, metier.persistence.Journee journee)
      Checks if a rescuer is available on a given day.
      Parameters:
      idSecouriste - The rescuer's ID
      journee - The day to check
      Returns:
      true if the rescuer is available (not found in the table), false otherwise
